testcase.name: To validate if the user has entered the valid credentials and redirection happens to the home page.
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Login page.................................................passed And User enters username with <"xyz1234@gmail.com">.........................passed And User enters password with <"Patil@123">.................................passed And User Clicks on login button.............................................passed Then User is logged in......................................................passed

testcase.classname: I want to check account details
